DOC.brief_summary: The safety efficacy video-laryngoscope primary intubation tool urgent endotracheal intubation critically-ill patient well-described literature . This study answer whether use VL impact efficacy safety intubation compare traditional direct laryngoscopy .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Endotracheal Intubation Using Glidescope Video-Laryngoscope
DOC.criteria: All patient undergoing urgent endotracheal intubation pulmonary critical care medicine physician Difficult airway Oxygen saturation < 92 % despite adequate mask ventilation
